meanings.sent1: The intraday trading session lasted only a few hours.
meanings.sent2: She made an intraday visit to the city and returned home by evening.
meanings.sent3: The intraday rain shower caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: His intraday decision to change career paths was unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The intraday sunlight illuminated the room beautifully.

meanings.definition: Relating to activities or fluctuations that happen within the same day.
meanings.sent1: The intraday market changes affected the stock prices significantly.
meanings.sent2: They closely monitored the intraday price movements of the cryptocurrency.
meanings.sent3: The intraday dance competition brought joy to all participants.
meanings.sent4: Her mood had intraday ups and downs like a rollercoaster.
meanings.sent5: The intraday energy levels of the team were high during the presentation.
